articles.description: Aditya Birla Fashion, Balrampur Chini Mills, Bandhan Bank, Chambal Fertilisers, GMR Infra, GNFC, IEX, India Cements, Indus Towers, Piramal Enterprises, and RBL Bank are the eleven stocks on the NSE’s F&O ban list for July 15
articles.content: F&O ban list: The National Stock Exchange (NSE) banned trading in eleven stocks on Monday, July 15, 2024, in the futures and options (F&O) segment as they exceeded 95% of the market-wide posi… [+1718 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Ratlam-based Kataria industries to float Rs 54.5 cr IPO on July 16 - Business Standard
articles.description: Ratlam-based Kataria Industries has fixed the price band at Rs 91 to Rs 96 per share for its Rs 54.58-crore initial public offering, the company said on Sunday.
articles.content: Incorporated in 2004, Kataria Industries Ltd has two manufacturing plants in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh. (Representative image)

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Indian AC industry likely to double in value over next 4 years: Blue Star - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The growth of India's AC industry would be from growing middle-class consumers with “high disposable incomes”, especially from smaller Tier III, IV & V markets.
articles.content:
The air-conditioning industry, valued at around 27,500 crore (USD 3.3 billion), is likely to double in the next four years, Blue Star has said in its annual report.

articles.title: Union Budget 2024: EV industry seeks incentives and tax rationalisation - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India's EV industry looks for FAME-III, fund allocation for charging infrastructure, incentives for localising components, and reduction of GST on EVs.
